biography: Tommy, a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, is known for his calm demeanor and strategic approach to the game. Representing Espoo Ringside Golf, Tommy has become a respected figure among his peers, admired for his sportsmanship and dedication.

While the coveted Hector Trophée and Victor Trophy have eluded him thus far, Tommy's commitment to improvement is evident. Each year, he returns with renewed vigor, eager to test his skills against the challenging competition. His upcoming appearance at Hector Trophée 2025 will mark his third participation in the event.

Off the course, Tommy is known to be a gregarious and affable individual, always ready with a smile and a kind word. His presence adds a positive and welcoming atmosphere to the tournament, making him a favorite among fellow competitors and spectators alike.
